metadata.title: CVE-2023-43091 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
[Code injection via service.json file]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnome-maps - 46.0-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnome-maps package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '46.0-1build1').
